description: Manage throughput of Table under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb table throughput migrate
commands.summary: Migrate the throughput of the Table between autoscale and manually provisioned.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table throughput migrate --account-name
                                     --name
                                     --resource-group
                                     --throughput-type {autoscale, manual}

commands.name: az cosmosdb table throughput show
commands.summary: Get the throughput of the Table under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb table throughput update
commands.summary: Update the throughput of the Table under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
